description: As researchers struggle to overcome decades of mistrust, 360,000 volunteers are participating in the accelerating race to find a coronavirus vaccine, and only 40,000 of them are minorities. NBC’s Ron Allen spoke with Dr. Fauci about why it’s so important for …
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Concern over whether coronavirus vaccine is being rushed
description: The CDC has told state governors to prepare to distribute millions of vaccine doses as soon as November 1, a massive logistical challenge.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Rescue team discovers possible sign of life under Beirut rubble weeks after blast
description: A Chilean and Lebanese rescue team detected what could be a heartbeat, and a thermal image indicating life in a crumbling building nearly one month after an explosion killed at least 191 people.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson and family tested positive for COVID-19
description: Johnson took to Instagram to share his family’s experience with the coronavirus.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: North Carolina officials issue stern warning after Trump suggests voting twice
description: Officials warned voters not to try and cast their ballots twice after President Trump suggested doing so during a trip to the battleground state Wednesday.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden meets with family of Jacob Blake during trip to Kenosha
description: Making his first trip to the crucial swing state of Wisconsin in two years, Joe Biden met privately with the family of Jacob Blake. Blake himself, now out of the ICU, joined by phone.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Growing outrage over death of Black man restrained by police in New York
description: Relatives of Daniel Prude, 41, released police video from the March incident, saying that it shows officers used excessive force to control him. The police chief says the department immediately launched an internal criminal investigation, and all of the offic…
source.name: NBC News

author: Tim Stelloh
title: FBI raids Pennsylvania nursing home where hundreds caught coronavirus, dozens died
description: Federal and state investigators raided a Pennsylvania nursing home Thursday where hundreds of residents and staff members tested positive for coronavirus and dozens have died, authorities said.
content:

author: Janelle Griffith
title: Facebook video of sexual assault found by teenage victim's mother leads to 7 arrests
description: A Facebook video of a 16-year-old girl being sexually assaulted while unconscious at a house party in Providence, Rhode Island, has led to charges against eight men, police said.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Examining the long history of poisoned Kremlin critics
description: NBC News’ Helena Humphrey breaks down the long history of the Russian state’s alleged poisoning of its critics, including up to 27 incidents since Putin assumed power.
source.name: NBC News
